turns.ai_line: Good morning, doctor. I dey experience serious stomach pain after I chop leftover rice yesterday. My area dey very hot and food dey spoil quick. Wetin I fit do?
turns.user_input: Well, most of me and you ate something bad. The rice could have been expired.

turns.ai_line: Omo, the pain dey really worry me. E start after I chop the rice wey I keep for fridge overnight. Na so e dey do, abi I fit take anything to help am?
turns.user_input: We can prescribe you some antibiotics so that the pain

turns.ai_line: Ah, this kain thing dey tire person. Wetin you feel say I fit do now to make the pain reduce small? Because e no easy at all.
turns.user_input: I just told you. Are you listening?
